com.kaichunlin.transition.adapter

Class DrawerListenerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kaichunlin.transition.adapter.BaseAdapter
      • com.kaichunlin.transition.adapter.MenuBaseAdapter
        • com.kaichunlin.transition.adapter.DrawerListenerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.widget.DrawerLayout.DrawerListener, ITransitionAdapter

    public class DrawerListenerAdapter
extends MenuBaseAdapter
implements android.support.v4.widget.DrawerLayout.DrawerListener
    Adapter for DrawerListener, the transition range goes from 0.0f to 1.0f, where 0.0f is the closed state and 1.0f is the opened state.

    Created by Kai-Chun Lin on 2015/4/14.
